scripts.build:offline: cross-env GATSBY_EXPERIMENTAL_ROUTING_APIS=1 TEST_PLUGIN_OFFLINE=y CYPRESS_SUPPORT=y gatsby build
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run start-server-and-test && npm run test-env-vars
scripts.test:offline: npm run build:offline && yarn start-server-and-test:offline && npm run test-env-vars
scripts.cy:run: npm run cy:run:normal && npm run cy:run:slow
scripts.cy:run:offline: npm run cy:run:normal -- --env TEST_PLUGIN_OFFLINE=y && npm run cy:run:slow -- --env TEST_PLUGIN_OFFLINE=y
scripts.cy:run:normal: (is-ci && cypress run --browser chrome --record) || cypress run --browser chrome
scripts.cy:run:slow: cross-env CYPRESS_CONNECTION_TYPE=slow cypress run --browser chrome --config testFiles=prefetching.js
